hero.title: 您的餐飲事業最佳夥伴
hero.subtitle: 專業餐飲顧問服務，協助您的品牌從理想到落地

brandStory.title: 品牌故事
brandStory.subtitle: 覓食的由來與理念
brandStory.content_p1: 乃是由一群對餐旅事業有高度熱忱的青年所組成。
brandStory.content_p2: 「覓食」的命名乃是以英文 Miss 的諧音作為發想，其意涵有想念、饗宴、回味無窮之意。
brandStory.content_p3: 「覓食」成立的使命是以台灣的本土化美食為依歸，推廣與行銷在地美食，提高台灣美食能見度。
brandStory.content_p4: 傳承好味道並讓傳統文化延續。
brandStory.content_p5: 「覓食」藉此激發顧客對台灣美食文化的熱愛，亦引領餐飲從業人員對餐飲服務之重視。
brandStory.quote: 從「心」出發，秉持著「取之於社會，用之於社會」的觀念，推廣台灣在地美食。

brandVision.title: 品牌願景
brandVision.line2: 透過不斷創新和品牌管理，
brandVision.line3: 將臺灣的美食文化發揚光大。

case_data.title: 肯特西餐廳
case_data.subtitle: 品牌重塑與空間改造
case_data.description: 協助肯特西餐廳進行品牌重塑與空間改造，從老舊西餐廳轉型為現代化美式餐廳，打造家的味道與懷舊氛圍。
case_data.fullDescription: 肯特西餐廳是老闆於民國六十四年創立的肯特西餐牛排館，曾經是台北東區唯一有駐唱的西餐廳，充滿濃厚的懷舊氛圍。經歷世代變遷，老舊西餐廳面臨歇業危機，但老闆秉持初衷，希望以「家」為本，用最美式的方式料理，把店內所有的餐點都賦予家的味道。我們協助其進行品牌重塑與空間改造，包括LOGO設計、菜單規劃、餐廳裝潢設計等，成功轉型為現代化美式餐廳。
solutions: 設計現代化LOGO，融合蜂巢、心型、家徽等元素
重新規劃菜單設計與視覺SOP
全面改造餐廳裝潢，營造活潑熱鬧氛圍
建立品牌一致性與現代化形象

case_data.title: 蘭亭餐廳
case_data.subtitle: 空間設計與品牌識別
case_data.description: 為蘭亭餐廳打造獨特的空間設計與品牌識別系統，創造優雅的用餐環境與品牌形象。
case_data.fullDescription: 蘭亭餐廳是一家主打精緻中餐的高級餐廳，希望透過空間設計與品牌識別系統的整合，創造獨特的用餐體驗。我們從品牌理念出發，設計了完整的視覺識別系統，並規劃了優雅的用餐空間，成功打造了蘭亭的品牌特色。
solutions: 建立完整的品牌識別系統
設計統一的空間風格
整合視覺元素與空間設計
優化顧客用餐流程

case_data.title: 老江紅茶牛奶
case_data.subtitle: 品牌升級與連鎖擴展
case_data.description: 協助老江紅茶牛奶進行品牌升級，制定連鎖擴展策略，提升品牌價值與市場份額。
case_data.fullDescription: 老江紅茶牛奶是高雄地區知名的傳統飲料店，希望透過品牌升級與連鎖擴展，擴大市場影響力。我們協助其進行品牌現代化改造，制定標準化的營運流程，並規劃連鎖擴展策略，成功幫助老江從單店經營轉型為連鎖品牌。
results: 連鎖店數從 1 家擴展至 8 家
solutions: 設計現代化的品牌形象
建立標準化營運流程
制定連鎖擴展策略
建立完善的管理體系

case_data.title: 三三燒肉
case_data.subtitle: 商業模式優化
case_data.description: 為三三燒肉進行商業模式診斷與優化，提升營運效率與顧客滿意度。
case_data.fullDescription: 三三燒肉是一家新興的日式燒肉店，希望透過商業模式優化來提升營運效率與顧客滿意度。我們協助其進行全面的商業診斷，包括營運流程分析、成本結構優化、服務流程改善等，成功提升了整體營運效能。
solutions: 建立標準化營運流程
優化成本結構與採購策略
改善服務流程與人員配置
導入數位化營運管理系統

case_data.title: 天元茶業
case_data.subtitle: 品牌定位與行銷推廣
case_data.description: 協助天元茶業建立清晰的品牌定位，制定有效的行銷推廣策略，擴大市場影響力。
case_data.fullDescription: 天元茶業是一家傳統茶葉品牌，希望透過品牌定位與行銷推廣策略的制定，擴大市場影響力。我們協助其建立清晰的品牌定位，制定有效的行銷推廣策略，包括品牌故事塑造、目標客群分析、行銷通路規劃等，成功提升了品牌知名度與市場份額。
solutions: 建立清晰的品牌定位與價值主張
制定系統性的行銷推廣策略
精準定位目標客群
導入數位行銷工具與平台

case_data.title: 香連鐵板料理
case_data.subtitle: 品牌重塑與餐廳改造
case_data.description: 協助香連鐵板料理進行品牌重塑與餐廳改造，結合台北石牌商圈文化與新竹竹東客家人待客豪情，打造獨特的日式鐵板料理品牌。
case_data.fullDescription: 香連鐵板料理是一家位於台北石牌的日本鐵板料理，店內強調嚴選當季食材，並以創新的料理方式呈現給顧客。覓食團隊以第一代經營者，來自台北石牌商圈人與新竹竹東客家人待客豪情文化結合，導入創意設計，塑造核心文化。我們協助其進行品牌重塑與餐廳改造，包括LOGO設計、餐廳外觀改造等，成功打造獨特的日式鐵板料理品牌形象。
challenges: 店面設計單調缺乏特色
solutions: 設計獨特LOGO，結合鐵板料理鍋鏟元素與中國風字體
改造餐廳外觀，融入日式風格與牡丹花圖樣
結合台北石牌商圈文化與新竹竹東客家人待客豪情
搭配溫暖黃光與木紋，打造舒適用餐環境

news_data.title: 覓食 (MISS) 榮獲2024年台灣餐飲顧問服務優質獎
news_data.subtitle: 專業服務獲得肯定，持續為餐飲業者提供優質顧問服務
news_data.excerpt: 覓食國際餐飲企業有限公司憑藉專業的餐飲顧問服務與優異的客戶滿意度，榮獲2024年台灣餐飲顧問服務優質獎。
news_data.content:
覓食國際餐飲企業有限公司憑藉專業的餐飲顧問服務與優異的客戶滿意度，榮獲2024年台灣餐飲顧問服務優質獎。這項殊榮肯定了我們在品牌規劃、商業設計與整合行銷等領域的專業能力。

我們將持續秉持「讓覓食餐飲陪你一起成長，用台灣美食帶給人們笑容」的理念，為更多餐飲品牌提供專業服務，協助他們在競爭激烈的市場中脫穎而出。

未來，覓食將繼續投入研發創新服務模式，結合數位科技與傳統餐飲智慧，為客戶創造更大的價值。
news_data.author: 覓食團隊

news_data.title: 新服務上線：餐飲品牌數位轉型顧問服務
news_data.subtitle: 協助傳統餐飲業者擁抱數位時代，提升競爭力
news_data.excerpt: 隨著數位化時代來臨，傳統餐飲業者面臨轉型挑戰。覓食推出全新的「餐飲品牌數位轉型顧問服務」。
news_data.content:
隨著數位化時代來臨，傳統餐飲業者面臨轉型挑戰。覓食推出全新的「餐飲品牌數位轉型顧問服務」，協助業者建立線上訂餐系統、社群媒體行銷策略、客戶關係管理等數位化營運模式。

這項服務包含：
• 數位化營運診斷
• 線上訂餐系統建置
• 社群媒體行銷策略
• 客戶數據分析
• 數位化員工培訓

我們相信，透過數位轉型，傳統餐飲業者能夠在保持原有特色的同時，提升營運效率與客戶體驗。
news_data.author: 產品團隊

news_data.title: 成功案例分享：老江紅茶牛奶品牌升級成果
news_data.subtitle: 從單店經營到連鎖品牌的成功轉型之路
news_data.excerpt: 老江紅茶牛奶是我們近期完成的品牌升級專案。透過系統性的品牌重塑與視覺識別更新，成功協助老江轉型。
news_data.content:
老江紅茶牛奶是我們近期完成的品牌升級專案。透過系統性的品牌重塑、視覺識別更新與連鎖擴展策略制定，成功協助老江從高雄地區的單店經營轉型為連鎖品牌。

專案成果：
• 連鎖店數從 1 家擴展至 8 家
• 品牌價值提升 200%
• 營收成長 150%
• 市場覆蓋率提升 300%

這個成功案例展現了覓食在品牌升級與連鎖擴展方面的專業能力，也為其他傳統餐飲業者提供了寶貴的參考經驗。
news_data.author: 顧問團隊

news_data.title: 2024年餐飲趨勢預測：健康飲食與永續發展
news_data.subtitle: 洞察未來餐飲市場發展方向，協助客戶提前布局
news_data.excerpt: 根據市場研究，2024年餐飲業將呈現健康飲食與永續發展兩大趨勢。
news_data.content:
根據市場研究與消費者行為分析，2024年餐飲業將呈現健康飲食與永續發展兩大趨勢。消費者越來越重視食材來源、營養價值與環境影響。

主要趨勢包括：
• 植物性飲食需求增長
• 有機與無添加食材
• 低碳足跡餐飲
• 包裝環保化
• 營養標示透明化

覓食將協助客戶順應這些趨勢，調整產品策略與行銷方向，在競爭中取得優勢。
news_data.author: 研究團隊

news_data.title: 覓食團隊擴編：歡迎新成員加入
news_data.subtitle: 強化服務能力，為客戶提供更全面的解決方案
news_data.excerpt: 為了提供更優質的服務，覓食近期擴編了設計團隊與顧問團隊。
news_data.content:
為了提供更優質的服務，覓食近期擴編了設計團隊與顧問團隊。新成員來自知名設計公司與餐飲集團，擁有豐富的實務經驗。

新增團隊成員：
• 資深品牌設計師 2 名
• 餐飲營運顧問 1 名
• 數位行銷專員 1 名
• 客戶服務專員 1 名

團隊擴編後，我們將能夠同時處理更多專案，為客戶提供更快速、更專業的服務。同時，多元化的專業背景也讓我們能夠從不同角度為客戶解決問題。
news_data.author: 人資團隊

news_data.title: 客戶回饋：蘭亭餐廳空間改造專案滿意度調查
news_data.subtitle: 客戶高度肯定我們的專業服務與執行能力
news_data.excerpt: 蘭亭餐廳空間改造專案完成後，我們進行了客戶滿意度調查，結果顯示客戶高度評價。
news_data.content:
蘭亭餐廳空間改造專案完成後，我們進行了客戶滿意度調查。結果顯示，客戶對我們的服務給予了高度評價，特別是在設計創意、施工品質與時程控制方面。

滿意度調查結果：
• 整體滿意度：96%
• 設計創意：98%
• 施工品質：95%
• 時程控制：94%
• 溝通協調：97%

這些正面回饋激勵我們持續精進服務品質，為更多客戶創造滿意的成果。
news_data.author: 客戶服務團隊

introduction.title: 公司簡介
introduction.p1: 覓食國際餐飲企業有限公司成立於2021年，由一群對餐旅事業有高度熱忱的青年所組成。
introduction.p2: 「覓食」的命名乃是以英文 Miss 的諧音作為發想，其意涵有想念、饗宴、回味無窮之意。
introduction.p3: 我們成立的使命是以台灣的本土化美食為依歸，推廣與行銷在地美食，提高台灣美食能見度。

faq.title: 常見問題
faq.subtitle: 以下是客戶最常詢問的問題，如果您有其他疑問，歡迎隨時與我們聯絡
faq.a1: A: 我們會先了解您的需求，進行初步診斷，然後制定專屬的服務方案。
faq.q2: Q: 服務費用如何計算？
faq.a2: A: 費用會根據專案複雜度與服務範圍而定，我們提供客製化的報價方案。
faq.a3: A: 根據專案性質，服務期間從數週到數月不等，我們會與您討論最適合的時程。
faq.a4: A: 歡迎透過聯絡表單或電話與我們聯繫，我們會安排專人為您服務。

hero.title: Your Best Partner in Food & Beverage Business
hero.subtitle: Professional F&B consulting services to help your brand from concept to reality

brandStory.title: Brand Story
brandStory.subtitle: The Origin and Philosophy of MISS
brandStory.content_p1: It is composed of a group of young people with high enthusiasm for the hospitality industry.
brandStory.content_p2: The name 'MISS' is inspired by the homonym of the English word Miss, which implies nostalgia, feasting, and endless aftertaste.
brandStory.content_p3: The mission of 'MISS' is to focus on Taiwan's local cuisine, promote and market local food, and increase the visibility of Taiwanese cuisine.
brandStory.content_p4: Inheriting good tastes and continuing traditional culture.
brandStory.content_p5: 'MISS' aims to inspire customers' love for Taiwanese food culture and to lead F&B practitioners to value catering services.
brandStory.quote: 'MISS' promises to leverage the experience of the group's brands and successful cases to assist stores that want to transform, start a business, or have achieved good results but want to improve further. The marketing team also promotes local food, taking Taiwanese cuisine to the world and providing customers with a high-quality dining experience.

brandVision.title: Brand Vision
brandVision.line1: 'MISS' is dedicated to discovering Taiwanese cuisine,
brandVision.line2: through continuous innovation and brand management,
brandVision.line3: to promote and glorify Taiwan's food culture.

case_data.title: Kent Western Restaurant
case_data.subtitle: Brand Revitalization & Space Renovation
case_data.description: Assisted Kent Western Restaurant in brand revitalization and space renovation, transforming an old western restaurant into a modern American-style diner, creating a taste of home and a nostalgic atmosphere.
case_data.fullDescription: Kent Western Restaurant, founded in 1975, was once the only western restaurant in Taipei's East District with live performances, exuding a strong nostalgic atmosphere. Through generational changes, the old restaurant faced closure but the owner held onto the original intention of creating a 'home' by preparing all dishes in the most American way possible. We assisted in its brand revitalization and space renovation, including logo design, menu planning, and restaurant decor, successfully transforming it into a modern American-style diner.
challenges: Inability to attract a younger audience
solutions: Designed a modern logo incorporating honeycomb, heart, and family crest elements
Re-planned menu design and visual SOPs
Completely renovated the restaurant decor to create a lively and vibrant atmosphere
Established brand consistency and a modern image

case_data.title: Lanting Restaurant
case_data.subtitle: Space Design & Brand Identity
case_data.description: Created a unique space design and brand identity system for Lanting Restaurant, establishing an elegant dining environment and brand image.
case_data.fullDescription: Lanting Restaurant is a high-end restaurant specializing in exquisite Chinese cuisine, aiming to create a unique dining experience through the integration of space design and brand identity. Starting from the brand's philosophy, we designed a complete visual identity system and planned an elegant dining space, successfully shaping Lanting's brand character.
challenges: Lack of consistency in space design
solutions: Established a complete brand identity system
Designed a unified spatial style
Integrated visual elements with space design
Optimized the customer dining flow

case_data.title: Laojiang Black Tea Milk
case_data.subtitle: Brand Upgrade & Chain Expansion
case_data.description: Assisted Laojiang Black Tea Milk with a brand upgrade and developed a chain expansion strategy to enhance brand value and market share.
case_data.fullDescription: Laojiang Black Tea Milk is a well-known traditional beverage shop in Kaohsiung, aiming to expand its market influence through a brand upgrade and chain expansion. We assisted in modernizing its brand, standardizing operational procedures, and planning a chain expansion strategy, successfully helping Laojiang transition from a single store to a chain brand.
solutions: Designed a modern brand image
Established standardized operational procedures
Developed a chain expansion strategy
Built a comprehensive management system

case_data.title: San San Yakiniku
case_data.subtitle: Business Model Optimization
case_data.description: Conducted a business model diagnosis and optimization for San San Yakiniku to improve operational efficiency and customer satisfaction.
case_data.fullDescription: San San Yakiniku is an emerging Japanese barbecue restaurant looking to improve operational efficiency and customer satisfaction through business model optimization. We conducted a comprehensive business diagnosis, including analysis of operational flows, cost structure optimization, and service process improvements, successfully enhancing overall operational performance.
solutions: Established standardized operational procedures
Optimized cost structure and procurement strategy
Improved service processes and staffing
Introduced a digital operational management system

case_data.title: Tianyuan Tea
case_data.subtitle: Brand Positioning & Marketing
case_data.description: Helped Tianyuan Tea establish clear brand positioning and develop effective marketing strategies to expand its market influence.
case_data.fullDescription: Tianyuan Tea is a traditional tea brand aiming to expand its market influence by defining its brand position and developing effective marketing strategies. We helped them establish a clear brand position, and create effective marketing strategies, including brand storytelling, target audience analysis, and marketing channel planning, successfully increasing brand awareness and market share.
solutions: Established a clear brand position and value proposition
Developed a systematic marketing and promotion strategy
Precisely targeted the customer audience
Introduced digital marketing tools and platforms

case_data.title: Xianglian Teppanyaki
case_data.subtitle: Brand Revitalization & Restaurant Renovation
case_data.description: Assisted Xianglian Teppanyaki with a brand revitalization and restaurant renovation, combining the culture of Taipei's Shipai district with the hospitality of Hsinchu's Zhudong Hakka community to create a unique Japanese teppanyaki brand.
case_data.fullDescription: Xianglian Teppanyaki, located in Taipei's Shipai district, emphasizes seasonal ingredients and innovative cooking. The MISS team blended the hospitality of the first-generation operator's Shipai and Hsinchu Zhudong Hakka roots with creative design to shape a core culture. We assisted with brand revitalization and restaurant renovation, including logo and exterior design, successfully creating a unique Japanese teppanyaki brand image.
solutions: Designed a unique logo combining teppanyaki spatula elements with Chinese-style calligraphy
Renovated the restaurant exterior, incorporating Japanese style and peony motifs
Blended the culture of Taipei's Shipai district with the hospitality of Hsinchu's Zhudong Hakka community
Used warm yellow lighting and wood grain to create a comfortable dining environment

news_data.title: MISS Honored with 2024 Taiwan F&B Consulting Service Quality Award
news_data.subtitle: Professional service recognized, continuing to provide quality consulting for the F&B industry
news_data.excerpt: MISS International F&B Co., Ltd. has been honored with the 2024 Taiwan F&B Consulting Service Quality Award for its professional consulting services and excellent customer satisfaction.
news_data.content:
MISS International F&B Co., Ltd. has been honored with the 2024 Taiwan F&B Consulting Service Quality Award for its professional consulting services and excellent customer satisfaction. This award recognizes our expertise in brand planning, business design, and integrated marketing.

We will continue to uphold the philosophy of 'Growing with you and bringing smiles to people with Taiwanese cuisine,' providing professional services to more F&B brands and helping them stand out in a competitive market.

In the future, MISS will continue to invest in developing innovative service models, combining digital technology with traditional culinary wisdom to create greater value for our clients.
news_data.author: MISS Team

news_data.title: New Service Launch: F&B Digital Transformation Consulting
news_data.subtitle: Helping traditional F&B businesses embrace the digital age and enhance competitiveness
news_data.excerpt: As the digital era arrives, traditional F&B businesses face transformation challenges. MISS is launching a new 'F&B Digital Transformation Consulting Service'.
news_data.content:
As the digital era arrives, traditional F&B businesses face transformation challenges. MISS is launching a new 'F&B Digital Transformation Consulting Service' to help businesses establish online ordering systems, social media marketing strategies, customer relationship management, and other digital operational models.

This service includes:
• Digital Operations Diagnosis
• Online Ordering System Setup
• Social Media Marketing Strategy
• Customer Data Analysis
• Digital Employee Training

We believe that through digital transformation, traditional F&B businesses can enhance operational efficiency and customer experience while maintaining their unique character.
news_data.author: Product Team

news_data.title: Case Study: Laojiang Black Tea Milk Brand Upgrade
news_data.subtitle: The successful transformation from a single store to a chain brand
news_data.excerpt: Laojiang Black Tea Milk is a recent brand upgrade project we completed. Through systematic brand revitalization and visual identity updates, we successfully assisted Laojiang's transformation.
news_data.content:
Laojiang Black Tea Milk is a recent brand upgrade project we completed. Through systematic brand revitalization, visual identity updates, and chain expansion strategy development, we successfully helped Laojiang transition from a single store in Kaohsiung to a chain brand.

Project Outcomes:
• Chain stores expanded from 1 to 8
• 200% increase in brand value
• 150% growth in revenue
• 300% increase in market coverage

This success story demonstrates MISS's expertise in brand upgrading and chain expansion, providing valuable insights for other traditional F&B businesses.
news_data.author: Consulting Team

news_data.title: 2024 F&B Trends: Healthy Eating & Sustainability
news_data.subtitle: Insight into future market trends to help clients plan ahead
news_data.excerpt: According to market research, the F&B industry in 2024 will be characterized by two major trends: healthy eating and sustainability.
news_data.content:
Based on market research and consumer behavior analysis, the F&B industry in 2024 will be characterized by two major trends: healthy eating and sustainability. Consumers are increasingly focusing on ingredient sourcing, nutritional value, and environmental impact.

Key trends include:
• Growth in demand for plant-based diets
• Organic and additive-free ingredients
• Low-carbon footprint dining
• Eco-friendly packaging
• Transparent nutrition labeling

MISS will help clients adapt to these trends by adjusting their product strategies and marketing approaches to gain a competitive edge.
news_data.author: Research Team

news_data.title: Team Expansion: Welcome New Members
news_data.subtitle: Strengthening our capabilities to provide more comprehensive solutions
news_data.excerpt: To provide even better service, MISS has recently expanded its design and consulting teams.
news_data.content:
To provide even better service, MISS has recently expanded its design and consulting teams. The new members come from renowned design firms and F&B groups, bringing a wealth of practical experience.

New team members include:
• 2 Senior Brand Designers
• 1 F&B Operations Consultant
• 1 Digital Marketing Specialist
• 1 Customer Service Specialist

With our expanded team, we can handle more projects simultaneously and provide faster, more professional services. At the same time, the diverse professional backgrounds also enable us to solve client problems from various perspectives.
news_data.author: HR Team

news_data.title: Customer Feedback: Lanting Restaurant Renovation Survey
news_data.subtitle: Clients highly affirm our professional services and execution
news_data.excerpt: After completing the Lanting Restaurant renovation project, we conducted a customer satisfaction survey, which showed high praise from the client.
news_data.content:
After completing the Lanting Restaurant renovation project, we conducted a customer satisfaction survey. The results showed that the client gave high praise to our services, especially in terms of design creativity, construction quality, and schedule control.

Satisfaction Survey Results:
• Overall Satisfaction: 96%
• Design Creativity: 98%
• Construction Quality: 95%
• Schedule Control: 94%
• Communication & Coordination: 97%

This positive feedback motivates us to continue improving our service quality and creating satisfactory results for more clients.
news_data.author: Customer Service Team

introduction.title: Company Introduction
introduction.p1: MISS International F&B Co., Ltd. was established in 2021 by a group of young professionals with a high passion for the hospitality industry.
introduction.p2: The name 'MISS' is a homophone for the English word, signifying remembrance, feasting, and unforgettable flavors.
introduction.p3: Our mission is to promote and market local Taiwanese cuisine, enhancing its visibility and recognition.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Here are the most frequently asked questions from our clients. If you have other questions, feel free to contact us.
faq.q1: Q: What is the service process?
faq.a1: A: We first understand your needs, conduct initial diagnosis, then develop customized service solutions.
faq.q2: Q: How are service fees calculated?

faq.q3: Q: How long is the service period?
